Keywords: Defenders , Mystical , Scientist , Spider-Man Family , Warp World
Real Name: Peter Parker
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Elevated, Characters
TARGETING: Elevated
A BROKEN MIND: THE ARACHNID, THE KNIGHT, THE C.E.O., THE SCIENTIST: Stealth, Super Senses. // FREE: Choose one to last until you choose again:
*Hypersonic Speed
*Flurry
*Shape Change
*Outwit
I DON'T NEED HELP, I NEED TARGETS: Precision Strike. // Once per turn, when Arachknight KO's an opposing character, you may roll a d6. 3-6: Choose an opposing character, then place Arachknight adjacent to that character and make a close attack targeting that character.
PERSONALITIES WORKING IN TANDEM: STOP. Regeneration, Toughness, Willpower.

November 4, 2022
Mysterydude5512
Pulled him, played him. He is stellar. Between super senses, stealth, optional shape change and his mobility he is up in your grill making you regret facing him then just bouncing out of the way of attacks. If you get the freebie attack that's just the cherry on the sundae. Versatile, well costed, and a cool sculpt to boot. Possibly even meta with the right team.

November 2, 2022
Decoder
[QUOTE=Oathful;12218500]Why does it feel like that trait is being made to have its format copied? Regardless, this guy has the possibility to pull some big plays off with that attack power. The key is going to be keeping him healthy enough to use it. If he's got a good buddy to help him lay the smackdown (that Drax cheated onto a Spider-Family team is looking nice to me), he'll put in work above his paygrade. Even without trying to chain KOs together, he brings a lot to the table with multiple STOP clicks, being able to pick from some of the best powers in the game anytime, and any figure that includes Mystics TA with STOP clicks (especially since he can heal from those STOP clicks) is immediately on my must-have radar. Plus, it's Spider-Man and Moon Knight mixed together, do we get much cooler in Warp World than that? // Thematic: 10/10, Viability: 9/10, Fun Factor: 9/10, leans towards biased-fun.[/QUOTE] I love how the only reason you really want this character is because of his powers lmao. . Oathful
Why does it feel like that trait is being made to have its format copied? Regardless, this guy has the possibility to pull some big plays off with that attack power. The key is going to be keeping him healthy enough to use it. If he's got a good buddy to help him lay the smackdown (that Drax cheated onto a Spider-Family team is looking nice to me), he'll put in work above his paygrade. Even without trying to chain KOs together, he brings a lot to the table with multiple STOP clicks, being able to pick from some of the best powers in the game anytime, and any figure that includes Mystics TA with STOP clicks (especially since he can heal from those STOP clicks) is immediately on my must-have radar.
